meanings.definition: A small, inflamed swelling of the skin, typically caused by acne.
meanings.sent1: She had a bothersome zit on her chin.
meanings.sent2: The teenager was self-conscious about the zit on his nose.
meanings.sent3: The zit on her forehead decided to make an appearance right before the party.
meanings.sent4: The zit on his cheek was like a tiny volcano ready to erupt.
meanings.sent5: The bright red zit stood out against her pale skin.

meanings.sent1: If you keep touching your face, you'll zit up.
meanings.sent2: She always seems to zit before important events.
meanings.sent3: Her face decided to zit right before her date, of course.
meanings.sent4: Stress can make you zit like crazy.
meanings.sent5: I hope I don't zit right before the big presentation.
